title: Pastor's Daughter
description: Julian has lived in the shadow of her father her entire life, always being the good girl he demanded. She's watched her friends experience life in a way she's only dreamt of. All she desires is to break free and escape the prison her father has kept her in.When twins, Tristian and Rance offer her an escape, she jumps at the chance to change her life, but stepping out of her shell isn't easy. She trusts the two men to show her how to live, and teach her all the things she's missed out on growing up sheltered.The world they open up for her is filled with excitement and pleasure like she's never imagined. For the first time she's free to be herself and experience life, but her father has different ideas. He will do whatever it takes to save his daughters soul, but in doing so, he risks losing her forever.Torn between respecting her father, and following her dreams, Julian struggles to find herself, while trying to protect her heart from the two men helping her.
author: E.M. Leya
